Akron.WDLI-TV: WDLI-TV, virtual channel 17 (UHF digital channel 49), is a TBN owned-and-operated television station serving Cleveland and Akron, Ohio, United States that is licensed to Canton. The station is owned by the Trinity Broadcasting Network. WDLI maintains offices and transmitter facilities located on the west side of Akron, just north of the former site of Rolling Acres Mall.
